resources.string: Start a sender on the remove device. Use this device IP (<tt>%s</tt>) as remote. Use default ports, 10001 for source, 10002 for repair, and start the receiver.
Start a receiver on the remote device, with ports 11001 as source, 11002 as repair. Put the remote device IP below and start the sender.
The receiver IP address looks invalid.
The app needs permission to record audio from your phone mic.
Thanks! The sender will now start.
